snippet: Jerome Williams, a pitcher with ties to Brooklyn, has taken a long, winding journey that is scheduled to land him back in New York, on the mound for the Los Angeles Angels at Yankee Stadium on Sunday.
abstract: Jerome Williams, a pitcher with ties to Brooklyn, has taken a long, winding journey that is scheduled to land him back in New York, on the mound for the Los Angeles Angels at Yankee Stadium on Sunday.

headline.main: Angels Pitcher Finds Hard Way Is His Only Way
headline.print_headline: Extra Bases: Angels Pitcher Finds Hard Way Is His Only Way
